transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi thi sir, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ha, theek hai, badhiya hai.
Executive: Sir, actually abhi aapka phone aaya tha, main jaan sakti hu exactly Gulam ji kya issue aa raha tha? Main Prashant ki manager baat kar rahi thi, woh due to leave par hai na, isliye woh aapka phone nahi utha paya sir.
Customer: Okay, okay. Nahi, main customer ka number laga raha tha, galti se aapke paas chala gaya number, hai na, IndiaMART ka.
Executive: I'm so sorry sir, actually aapka na yaha pe customer care par ek concern open ho gaya hai. Aapko agar koi aur challenge nahi hai toh main ise band kar du kya?
Customer: A, band kar dijiye ji.
Executive: Theek hai, aapke paas ek feedback aayega sir, agar aap hamari call se satisfy hai toh please satisfy dijiyega, theek hai? Waise sir services wagera theek chal rahi hai IndiaMART ki aapki services par?
Customer: Ha, theek hai, abhi satisfy hu main isko.
Executive: Okay sir, koi baat nahi sir, future mein koi bhi issues hoga aap call kar lijiyega. We will help out you. Abhi main ye concern aapka close kar rahi hu. Please kuch aur hota hai toh bataiyega sir. Thank you so much for giving your time, have a nice day sir. Please feedback zarur dena sir, ha, satisfy ka.
Customer: Ji, zarur dunga. Okay.
Executive: Okay sir.
Customer: Ye kya hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called IndiaMART by mistake.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close the customer care concern.

- Executive requested a satisfactory feedback.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- customer care, feedback, services
